name: nodejs-frontend-boilerplate
description: Este proyecto es un boilerplate que nos permite optimizar proyectos Frontend con Node.js y NPM

scripts.g:package: npm i -g gulp pug pug-cli node-sass node-sass-cli postcss postcss-cli imagemin imagemin-cli browser-sync onchange parallelshell
scripts.dev:package: npm i -D gulp gulp-pug gulp-sass gulp-babel babel-preset-es2015 gulp-imagemin imagemin-pngquant gulp-svgmin gulp-webp gulp-useref gulp-concat gulp-uncss gulp-autoprefixer gulp-clean-css gulp-uglify browser-sync onchange parallelshell
scripts.dep:package: npm i -S animate.css wowjs responsimple font-awesome jquery owl.carousel
scripts.build:dev: npm run pug && npm run sass && npm run es6
scripts.watch:dev: parallelshell "npm run serve" "npm run watch:pug" "npm run watch:sass" "npm run watch:es6"
scripts.dev: npm run build:dev && npm run watch:dev
scripts.build:media: npm run img && npm run svg && npm run webp && npm run resize && npm run fonts && npm run statics
scripts.build:prod: npm run css && npm run js && npm run html
scripts.watch:prod: parallelshell "npm run serve" "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:js" "npm run watch:html"
scripts.start: npm run build:prod && npm run watch:prod

author: Jonathan MirCha <jonmircha@gmail.com>
